FuncDef: The ls command lists all the directories and files in the present working directory of remote machine.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the directory name in the remote machine.
Remote directory name is a string data type. The string length range is from 1 to 128 characters.

Specifies the local file to be saved in the directory of remote machine.
Local file name is a string data type. The string length range is from 1 to 128 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
By default, the ls command displays all the files, if you do not specify any parameters.
